p: Data were collected through participatory rural appraisal viz: Highland, Midland and Lowland agro-climatic zones of Dinki watershed socio-ecological system, central highlands of Ethiopia. The focus group discussions and interviews were conducted during November 2017, whereas the household survey was conducted during February 2018. Prior to data collection, an ethics statement which also approved this particular study was received from the Institutional Review Board (IRB), Institute of Health, Jimma University and provided to the Ankober district administration office.
